ygData.msgSnippet: ... Firearm frowns. Iron Raptor had not responded to him yet. He activates his comm-link again, repeating his message: Commander, a Maximal, named Hell Drak,

Subject: Requesting Troops From Maxi Commander

Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
X-Mailer: AOL 4.0 for Windows 95 sub 107
From: Yanshosh@...

::Firearm::

Firearm frowns. Iron Raptor had not responded to him yet. He activates his 
comm-link again, repeating his message: "Commander, a Maximal, named Hell 
Drak, has been captured by the Predacons. Firearm here, requesting troops for 
a rescue mission."
